title: Grand jury rejects DOJ attempt to indict 6 Democrats in Congress
shortDescription: A grand jury rejected charges sought by the Department of Justice against six Democratic lawmakers who appeared in a video that told service members they had a right to refuse illegal orders

title: Governors to skip Trump meeting after White House excluded Democrats
shortDescription: The White House meeting, which was scheduled for February 20, was slated to be part of the National Governors Association's annual winter gathering.

title: GOP rep wants probe of Bad Bunny Super Bowl halftime show: 'Pure smut'
shortDescription: A GOP congressman has requested an investigation of Bad Bunny's history-making Super Bowl LX halftime performance, claiming it was "pure smut."

title: Congress plans to bury a time capsule. Should a rock album go inside?
shortDescription: Members of Congress are already joking about burying rivals and rock albums. But will they be able to agree on what to put in a time capsule?

title: Trump to repeal greenhouse gas finding in major deregulatory rollback
shortDescription: The Trump administration is rescinding an Obama-era scientific finding that has served as the legal basis for regulations targeting greenhouse gases.

title: Is there a sales tax increase for LA County? Here's what to know
shortDescription: Here's everything to know about the proposal, and what it'll cost residents.

title: Proposal would raise county sales tax for five years to 2031
shortDescription: The Los Angeles County Board of Supervisors is considering a half cent sales tax increase following significant federal funding cuts.

title: Trump touts bill that could make voting harder for married women
shortDescription: Here's how the voting ID law could make it harder for married women to register to vote and cast ballots if passed.

title: White House supports Lutnick amid Epstein scandal
shortDescription: Secretary of Commerce Howard Lutnick distanced himself from Jeffrey Epstein following information that he went to Epstein's island.

title: DOJ Georgia 2020 election probe kickstarted by White House, documents say
shortDescription: The DOJ's explanation for seeking to seize 2020 election ballots in Georgia was laid bare Feb. 10, after a court forced it to release a key document.

title: White House on new Nancy Guthrie suspect images
shortDescription: President Donald Trump reviewed newly released surveillance footage in the Nancy Guthrie missing person case, according to The White House.

title: Two Democrats disinvited to Governors dinner
shortDescription: President Trump breaks tradition and has excluded two Democratic governors from a White House dinner.

title: Two Democrats disinvited to Governors dinner
shortDescription: President Trump breaks tradition and has excluded two Democratic governors from a White House dinner.

title: Dem governors to boycott White House dinner over disinvites
shortDescription: Eighteen Democratic governors said Donald Trump disinviting two of their colleagues is the latest example of the White House's "chaos and division."

title: 'This is how a wave starts': Democrat wins Louisiana special election
shortDescription: On the heels of a state legislative win in Texas, Democrats saw a 37-point swing that kept a Louisiana state House seat in their ranks.

title: Susan Collins confirms 2026 Maine re-election run
shortDescription: Sen. Susan Collins, a Republican from Maine, posted an unboxing video to confirm her run for re-election in 2026.

title: Trump threatens to block Detroit Windsor bridge
shortDescription: President Trump is threatening to block the Detroit Windsor Bridge until the U.S. receives full compensation, questioning Canada's ownership and trade deals.

title: Howard Lutnick denies relationship with Jeffrey Epstein at Senate
shortDescription: Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said he had nothing to hide about his meetings with Jeffrey Epstein but a senator questioned his credibility.

title: Moderate's last stand? Susan Collins seeks reelection after clash with Trump
shortDescription: Republican Sen. Susan Collins confirmed she is running for a sixth term, setting up what could be a costly, key 2026 midterm fight.

title: ICE on hot seat as officials testify before Congress: recap
shortDescription: Top immigration officials testified before the Homeland Security Committee after the shooting deaths of Renee Good and Alex Pretti in Minnesota.
